summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Plats 4W and 13W, pages 40 and 57 of The Official Zoning Map to rezone certain property in Blocks 82-85, 98 and 99, Supplemental Plat of West Woodland Park Addition, Block 1, Phinney Ave. Addition, and Blocks 1-5, Riley's Woodland Park Addition located along both sides of Phinney Ave. N. extending North from a point approximately 300 feet North of North 65th St. on the East Side and a point approximately 475 feet North of N. 65th St. on the West Side, from BC to RM 800. (C.F. 287009 - Petition of Laura Bernard, et al.)
